data.description: <p><span style="font-size:16.0px"><span style="font-family:Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif"><b>Location Designation:</b> Hybrid - 3 days per week </span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:0.0pt;margin-left:0.0in;margin-right:0.0in;margin-top:0.0in"> </p><div><div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Shape your future with a dynamic internship experience at New York Life. We offer opportunities across a variety of exciting businesses, including Actuarial, AI &amp; Data, Finance, Investments, Technology, Underwriting, and more. Your internship journey is designed to challenge you through hands-on work experience that will equip you with valuable skills you can use anywhere. You will build your network through collaboration and connection with talented interns and experienced employees through team-building activities, mentorship programs, and fun social events. By the end of your internship, you'll be equipped with new skills and a network that will propel you forward in your career journey. </span></p></div><div><p> </p><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><strong>Program Overview: </strong></span></p><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Launch Your Career in a Technology, Data, and AI–Driven Organization with Purpose and Impact!</span></p><p> </p><div><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Join us as a Technology Analyst Summer Intern for an immersive 11-week experience where innovation, collaboration, and real-world impact intersect. As part of our dynamic Technology, Data, AI &amp; Ventures department, you’ll gain hands-on exposure to cutting-edge projects that drive our digital transformation, while exploring potential career paths in Technology!</span></p><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Throughout the summer, you’ll deepen your technical skills, expand your professional network, and receive mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals and senior leaders. Our program combines meaningful project work with learning and development opportunities designed to prepare you for success beyond graduation. </span></p><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">You’ll connect with a diverse cohort of interns, collaborate on a team-based capstone project, and contribute to our commitment to social good by participating in our Volunteer for Good initiative. Whether you're building innovative solutions, leveraging AI and automation, or reimagining the future of work, you’ll play a vital role in helping us shape what’s next in technology. </span></p><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">This internship is more than just a summer job—it’s a steppingstone toward becoming a future-ready technology professional, with the opportunity to convert to a full-time role after graduation. </span></p></div></div></div><div> </div><div> </div><div><p> </p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>About the Internship </strong></span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Join us for 11 weeks as a Technology Analyst Intern, where you’ll: </span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Work on real-world technology projects that support our business </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Learn how AI and automation are transforming financial services </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Collaborate with teams across the company to solve meaningful problems </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Participate in intern socials, mentorship, and Volunteer for Good community events </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Engage in a group capstone project with other Technology, AI &amp; Data Interns </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><img style="height: auto; width: auto;" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAARnQU1BAACxjwv8YQUAAAAJcEhZcwAADsMAAA7DAcdvqGQAAAANSURBVBhXY2BgYGAAAAAFAAGKM+MAAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" alt="Shape"></span></p><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>What You'll Do </strong></span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>As a Technology Analyst, you'll: </strong></span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Connect business needs with technology solutions—often powered by AI and data </span></p></li></ul></div></div><div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Help redesign processes and document improvements </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Support product owners with feature development and testing </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Analyze data and trends to help drive decisions </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Create dashboards and reports to monitor performance </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Recommend ways to improve operations using smart technologies </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><img style="height: auto; width: auto;" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAARnQU1BAACxjwv8YQUAAAAJcEhZcwAADsMAAA7DAcdvqGQAAAANSURBVBhXY2BgYGAAAAAFAAGKM+MAAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" alt="Shape"> </span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>What We're Looking For </strong></span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>Required: </strong></span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Rising senior or graduate student pursuing a degree in Business, Computer Science, or related field </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Interest in financial services and emerging technologies like AI </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Strong communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>Preferred: </strong></span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">GPA of 3.2 or higher </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Experience documenting technical or business requirements </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><img style="height: auto; width: auto;" src="data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAAARnQU1BAACxjwv8YQUAAAAJcEhZcwAADsMAAA7DAcdvqGQAAAANSURBVBhXY2BgYGAAAAAFAAGKM+MAAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC" alt="Shape"> </span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><strong>Why New York Life </strong></span></p></div><div><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">We’re one of Fortune’s World’s Most Admired Companies, driven by a mission to serve communities and help people achieve financial security. As an intern, you’ll join a collaborative, inclusive culture where innovation is encouraged, and AI is shaping the future of work. </span></p></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Applications reviewed: On a rolling basis </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul style="list-style-type: disc;"><li style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;"><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">Interviews begin: Mid-September </span></p></li></ul><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><em>To be eligible for this program, you must be authorized to work in the U.S. We do not offer any type of employment-based immigration sponsorship for this program. Likewise, this program is not available to those authorized to work under optional practical training (OPT) or curricular practical training (CPT). </em></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14pt;"><span style="color: white;"><strong><span style="color: black;">Curious what it’s like to intern at NYL? Check out </span><span style="color: rgb(30, 83, 163);"><a title="https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/all/?keywords=%23nylearlycareers&amp;origin=global_search_header&amp;sid=eko" href="https://www.linkedin.com/search/results/all/?keywords=%23nylearlycareers&amp;origin=GLOBAL_SEARCH_HEADER&amp;sid=EkO" target="_blank" rel="noopener">#NYLEarlyCareers</a></span><span style="color: black;"> on LinkedIn!</span></strong></span></span></p><table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="3" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td style="padding: 0.75pt 0.75pt 0.75pt 0.75pt;"><p style="margin: 0.0in; font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: Aptos, sans-serif;"><span style="color: white; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">#Techcampus</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p><span style="color: white; font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14.0pt;">#LI-CV1 </span></p></div></div><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;">​<strong><span style="color: black;">Pay Transparency</span></strong></span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Salary Range: <span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">$30-35/hour + $3,000 housing stipend</span></span></span></span> </span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Overtime eligible: <span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Nonexempt</span></span></span></span> </span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Discretionary bonus eligible: <span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">No</span></span></span></span> </span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">Sales bonus eligible: <span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;"><span style="color: #1d2d3e;">No</span></span></span></span> </span></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;">Actual base salary will be determined based on several factors but not limited to individual’s experience, skills, qualifications, and job location. Additionally, employees are eligible for an annual discretionary bonus. In addition to base salary, employees may also be eligible to participate in an incentive program.</span></span></p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><strong><span style="color: black;">Our Diversity Promise</span></strong></span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: black;">We believe in a diverse workforce because it is our mission to advocate for the financial security and success of people in every community. This is why diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are guiding principles that are embedded in our brand and our culture. </span><a style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.newyorklife.com/newsroom/diversity-and-inclusion-awards">Click here</a><span style="color: black;"> to learn more about how we have been recognized for our leadership.</span></span></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;"><span style="color: black;">Recognized as one of </span><em><span style="color: black;">Fortune’s</span></em><span style="color: black;"> World’s Most Admired Companies, New York Life is committed to improving local communities through a culture of employee giving and volunteerism, supported by the <a style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;" href="http://www.newyorklife.com/foundation">Foundation</a>. We're proud that due to our mutuality, we operate in the best interests of our policy owners. To learn more about career opportunities at New York Life, please visit the <a style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;" href="https://www.newyorklife.com/about/careers/">Careers</a> page of <a style="color: blue; text-decoration: underline;" href="http://www.NewYorkLife.com">www.NewYorkLife.com</a></span><span class="MsoHyperlink" style="color: blue;"><u style="text-decoration: underline;">.</u></span></span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;">​</span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif; color: white;"><span style="font-size: 14.0px;">​<!--StartFragment--><span data-olk-copy-source="MessageBody">#Techcampus</span> </span></span></p>
